description:
Today if a tenant has more than a network visible to it and during boot it does not specify any network, the famous NetworkAmbiguous is returned. It would be nice if there was a way for Nova and Neutron to fall back on the adoption of a tenant-level 'default' network.

[1] https://etherpad.openstack.org/p/pike-neutron-gman (line 29)
title: [RFE] Deal with NetworkAmbiguous error

comments.content: Nova's feature freeze will be on October 19th (in one week as of this writing). As a consequence, I don't think we are going to be able to get the Nova team to prioritize this effort during Queens. Probably the best approach is to start writing a spec on the Nova side, so we are ready the next time they unfreeze features. I will probe mriedeman to see if there is appetite for this on his side
